member.name: M:Primrose.Expressions.IMatcher.Match(System.String)
member.summary: Return the number of characters that this "regex" or equivalent matches.
member.returns: The number of characters that matched

member.name: T:Primrose.Expressions.ValObj
member.summary: A value holder for reference types.
member.comment: Since the Val object that contains this struct is internal for use as the expression value only, it should be constrained to supported types. If the expression tree is to support generics, then swtiching to a single 'object' field
